ARTICLE.TITLE: RADIO PAKISTAN
ARTICLE.TEXT:
Government is committed to handle the situation with utmost responsibility and care:

Ali Mohammad Khan (Minister of State for Parliamentary Affairs):Coronavirus is a global challenge and the incumbent government is committed to handle the situation with utmost responsibility and care. The Prime Minister Imran Khan is highly concerned with the health care facilitates at health centers all over the country. We are hopeful that we would overcome this challenge in coming days. The citizens of Pakistan should take all precautionary measures and follow the government instructions properly to stay safe. It is responsibility of the government to take care of the people however people should also limit their public interactions. The religious leaders can also play an important role in controlling the spread of pandemic Coronavirus.
